content:
Can somebody please give me collaborator rights on github to the IG?
I want to add some invariants, fixes etc. to the IG

Hi Patrick - For commit access, you need to send me an email confirming that you've read and agree to abide by chapter 16 of HL7's GOM and that you've signed up for and agree to actively monitor the committers chat. As well, any changes that you make should be tied to approved change requests.
